segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent and hopeful, it's really sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy struggling to reach the cookie jar, and I hope he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks so unstable, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being very patient, waiting for her brother to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely oblivious to the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like the girl is being very well-behaved, not trying to climb up herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so peaceful, it's a nice contrast to the tension inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy can get the cookies without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it's making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman needs to realize what's happening before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
